entry.title: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!
entry.summary: The conversation discusses the absence of a hard fork mechanism that isn't prone to systemic consensus failure. The suggestion is made to use an opcode that is not currently defined. The writer requests that the article they wrote be read and the points addressed without insults. The article apparently did not mention SPV wallets, but the responder mentions that the belief that these wallets are inherently insecure is trollish and disagrees with it.
